name: RootsSuffixesPrefixes
0:

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word roots
des: Alexa will read aloud to you lectures on medical terminology, starting with word roots, suffixes, and prefixes then and ask you questions about each lesson. Test your listening comprehension by remembering facts and details. Answer correctly and achieve a high score.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
